name: Multiplayer Driving RPG
description:
You can drive in the city along with other players. Isn't that awesome? The main idea is to make role based multiplayer driving game. You can become Taxi driver, Bus driver, Mechanic etc.

The game is in the prototye stage, and activly in development. I am working alone on the project, and thats why your support is so valuable for me!

If you like the idea please follow dev logs. Also I am fully open to interesting idea suggestions. 

And in the end. Please support me by donating for cup of coffee. :)

------------- BuyMeACoffee -------------

----- Instructions ----- 
Download .zip file, and extruct it.
Run prototype.exe
Internet connection required! (Its server based multiplayer)

----- Controls ----- 
WASD - for driving
Space - for handbrake
For fill gas or fixing car press F
Gamepad/Xbox controllers not implemented yet.

PS. I didn't made exit button yet :D So press Alf+f4 to exit game :D
